articles.title: Who Wrote ‘Citizen Kane’? It’s No Mystery - The New York Times
articles.description: The Netflix drama “Mank” suggests that Herman J. Mankiewicz, credited along with Orson Welles, primarily wrote the script. But that has long been debunked by scholars.
articles.content: She picks the guy who is the epitome of the auteur in America and tears down his one great achievement that everybody can agree on, said Joseph McBride, who wrote three books on Welles and acted for … [+1901 chars]
